Class Log4JTaskLogs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.common.task.Log4JTaskLogs
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TaskLogs

    @PublicAPI
public class Log4JTaskLogs
extends Object
implements TaskLogs
    Log4j based implementation of TaskLogs.
